Posts.Content: Hi Courtney, I so agree with didee....I was diagnosed with brest cancer 1996....7 of 22 lymph nodes they removed were cancerous...i have been clear since my treatments, and so has my sister...STAY OFF THE INTERNET.....Doctors(not nurses) will keep you informed...everyone that you meet will tell you of a natural substance to take..We chose shark cartlage..lol....You will be fine...I know its hard to stay positive in the beginning going through all the tests....But we have come along way over the years in cureing breast cancer...and I was stage 3....Please keep us updated
Posts.Title: Lump found and ultrasound done...confused
